am:content.p: Names of all people who contributed to this site in some way, will be forever remembered in this section (presented in alphabetical order).

ul.li: Cassiraa - design and new features ideas
Fithz Hood - balance changes and new cards suggestions
Igniteice - balance changes and new cards suggestions
Lukáš Čajági - author of our fantasy novels
Sylonus - new game mechanics and new cards suggestions
Viperio - balance changes and new cards suggestions
X-Factor - images refinement (cards and others), new card images design
